html:
To help you anticipate and navigate all that television has to offer across broadcast, cable and streaming, TVLine offers daily, weekly and monthly What to Watch digests, as well as an overview of every new TV show premiering in 2025.

The TVLine-Up is nowâ€¦ What to Watch This Week! As always, youâ€™ll find a comprehensive list of premieres, finales, original movies and specials â€” only now, new series and films are in bold, and each comes with a handy synopsis so you donâ€™t need to look elsewhere to determine whether a title interests you. #TVLineCares

This week, youâ€™ll find 10 new shows (including Daredevil: Born Again, Deli Boys and Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue), seven returning favorites (including Doctor Odyssey, Greyâ€™s Anatomy and 9-1-1) and nine finales (including Love Is Blind, Mayfair Witches and Paradise).

Want scoop on any of the following shows? Email usÂ and your question may be answered in Mattâ€™s Inside Line.
